title: Eliminate sorry: Lemma06.lean:115 - second_3cycle_mem_H
description: Extract 3-cycle c[1,5,2] from [g₁,g₂]. Depends on Lemma09.
close_reason: Resolved: Same as af-685/af-529. The individual 3-cycles from commutators are NOT in H₆ because they break the block structure. The base case (n=k=m=0) has H₆ ≅ S₄ which preserves blocks but individual 3-cycles do not. See Lemma06/07/08.lean.
